@roytang I'm having trouble finding a good article on it, but probably something like this: https://wordpress.org/support/topic/unwanted-indexing-of-pages-with-spam-search-queries-in-google/

If your search results pages can be indexed by Google, spammers doing this basically inserts whatever the spammer was searching for into your website, taking advantage of your SEO.
